db:select.doc:name: Get account analysis config values by parent request id
db:select.db:sql: select distinct c.OUTFILE_NAME, c.ARGUMENT10, c.ARGUMENT20 from apps.FND_CONCURRENT_REQUESTS c, apps.FND_CONCURRENT_REQUESTS p where c.priority_request_id = :priorityRequestID and p.HAS_SUB_REQUEST = 'Y' and p.IS_SUB_REQUEST = 'N' and p.DESCRIPTION ='SBS GL Account Analysis Request Set' and c.parent_request_id <> :priorityRequestID and c.request_id <> :priorityRequestID order by 3

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 import * from dw::core::Arrays output application/json encoding="UTF-8" --- payload map ((payload01 , indexOfPayload01) -> { 'reportFileAbsolutePath': payload01.OUTFILE_NAME default "", 'monthToBeProcessed': if((not isEmpty(payload01.ARGUMENT10)) and not (payload01.ARGUMENT10 == "\u0000")) payload01.ARGUMENT10 else "", 'destinationCostCentre': if((not isEmpty(payload01.ARGUMENT20)) and not (payload01.ARGUMENT20 == "\u0000")) payload01.ARGUMENT20 else "" })

db:select.doc:name: Get fsg report config values
db:select.db:sql: select report_name, attribute1 path from apps.RG_REPORT_REQUESTS_V where attribute1 is not null

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json encoding="UTF-8" --- payload map ((payload01 , indexOfPayload01) -> { 'reportFileName': payload01.REPORT_NAME default "", 'reportPath': if((not isEmpty(payload01.PATH)) and not (payload01.PATH == "\u0000")) payload01.PATH else "" })
